omarwkh.bibtex

Class BibFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • omarwkh.bibtex.BibFile

  • public class BibFile
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a .bib file. Stores entries in a Map and allows searching through them by key or attribute value. Usage: Create an instance by passing file path. Call loadFile() to store entries. If file wasn't changed since last load operation, it won't be loaded. A file is changed if its last modification time was changed since last load operation.

    • Method Detail

      • loadFile

        public void loadFile()
              throws java.io.IOException
        Loads the file entries into a Map of (BibKey, BibEntry) pairs if the file changed since the last load operation (or was never loaded).
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If wasChanged() or markAsRead() threw it.
        See Also:
        BibFileParser

      • validateFile

        public void validateFile()
                  throws java.nio.file.NoSuchFileException
        Makes sure the file exists.
        Throws:
        java.nio.file.NoSuchFileException - If file does not exist.

      • wasChanged

        public boolean wasChanged()
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Returns:
        True if file was changed since it was marked as read or if it was never read. False otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if Files.getLastModifiedTime() throws it

      • find

        public java.util.Vector<BibKey> find(java.lang.String query)
        Searches through the list of loaded entries. A match is found if either key or attribute values contain the given string (using String.contains, so every string contains the empty string).
        Parameters:
        query - The string to search for
        Returns:
        A Vector of BibKeys whose entries contain the given string in the key or the attribute values. All the entries if the given string is empty.

      • getEntry

        public BibEntry getEntry(BibKey key)
        Parameters:
        key - BibKey for the entry
        Returns:
        The entry with the given BibKey. Null if no such entry exists.

      • getEntry

        public BibEntry getEntry(java.lang.String key)
        Creates a BibKey objects and calls getEntry(BibKey)
        Parameters:
        key - The string representing the BibKey for the entry
        Returns:
        The entry if found. Null if not.

        public java.nio.file.Path getPath()

      • getCount

        public int getCount()
        Returns:
        Number of loaded entries.
